DateFormat Class Reference

This header file defines Date Format. More...

#include <DateFormat.h>

Detailed Description

This header file defines Date Format. 

       DateFormat* dateFormat = new DateFormat();
       if (dateFormat)
       {
           printf("%s","instance create succ.\n");
           {
               Date* date = new Date(1999,9,9,9,9,9);
               gaia::base::String* pattern = new gaia::base::String("MM/dd/yyyy hh:mm aa");
               printf("format result is %s.\n", (dateFormat->format(date)).string());
               printf("toLocalizedPattern result is %s.\n", (dateFormat->toLocalizedPattern()).string());
               printf("toPattern result is %s.\n", (dateFormat->toPattern()).string());
               dateFormat->applyLocalizedPattern(*pattern);
               dateFormat->applyPattern(*pattern);
           }

           delete dateFormat;
           dateFormat = NULL;
       }
       else
       {
           printf("%s","instance create field.\n");
       }
